description: I love to satisfy a woman---to give her Pleasure (sexual. intellectual, emotional), because I already know that This would make me happy...alive and proud of my masculinity., And for This to happen, I look at her, I listen to her and I talk to her....just to understand one thing: what is it she wants, she needs and dreams of that I could help her with; I know she's been waiting for ME all her life! So, My Love, let me get to You--it is the right time!
